title: account
body:
my old account was banned several months ago, and the last thing i did to that account was play xayah cause i got it from re rolling some champs in loot, then the next day , i got banned, i forgot my existing email for that account so i can't check why riot banned my account, because i played for more than 3 years and didn't know why, i wish to regain my account. 
garena ID: 169974857
IGN: o LOGIC o.
Riot please, begging you to give me back my account.

replies.body: Hey there, unfortunately we don't support or even have the tools to access garena accounts.  Your best bet would be to reach out to[ garena support ](http://support.lol.garena.com/en_SG)directly for more context.
